properties.description:
Name : Nextpathway
Date : 02/06/2023
Description : Pulls data from Azure SQL and Upsert data in SFDC - ACCOUNT

activities.name: cd-ACCOUNT
activities.description: Pulls data from Azure SQL and loads to Salesforce Account table

source.sqlReaderQuery:
with ADVISER_NETWORK
as
(select distinct
        NETWORK_PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        STAGE_CDI.F_INITCAP(ORGANISATION_NAME) as ORGANISATION_NAME,
        FIRM_REFERENCE_NUMBER,
        STATUS,
        REGULATORY_STATUS_ID,
        PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID,
        PERM_INVESTMENT_ADVICE,
        PERM_MORTGAGE_ADVICE,
        PERM_INSURANCE_ADVICE,
        PERM_PENSION_ADVICE,
        STAGE_CDI.F_INITCAP(ADDRESS_LINE_1) as ADDRESS_LINE_1,
        STAGE_CDI.F_INITCAP(ADDRESS_LINE_2) as ADDRESS_LINE_2,
        STAGE_CDI.F_INITCAP(ADDRESS_LINE_3) as ADDRESS_LINE_3,
        STAGE_CDI.F_INITCAP(ADDRESS_LINE_4) as ADDRESS_LINE_4,
        POSTCODE,
        STAGE_CDI.F_DEPERSONALISE(EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS) as EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS,
        STAGE_CDI.F_DEPERSONALISE(PHONE_FAX_NUMBER) as PHONE_FAX_NUMBER,
        max(UPDATE_DATE_TIME) as UPDATE_DATE_TIME
   from STAGE_CDI.DPDB_ADVISER_NETWORK_STG
  where UPDATE_DATE_TIME > (select PARAMETER_VALUE_DT
                              from STAGE_CDI.BATCH_PARAMETER
                             where PROCESS_NAME = 'p_CDI-SFDC-ACCOUNT-ADVISER_NETWORK'
                               and PARAMETER_NAME = 'prm_EXTRACTDT'
                            )
  group by NETWORK_PARTY_ROLE_ID,
           ORGANISATION_NAME,
           FIRM_REFERENCE_NUMBER,
           STATUS,
           REGULATORY_STATUS_ID,
           PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID,
           PERM_INVESTMENT_ADVICE,
           PERM_MORTGAGE_ADVICE,
           PERM_INSURANCE_ADVICE,
           PERM_PENSION_ADVICE,
           ADDRESS_LINE_1,
           ADDRESS_LINE_2,
           ADDRESS_LINE_3,
           ADDRESS_LINE_4,
           POSTCODE,
           EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS,
           PHONE_FAX_NUMBER
),
TRANSLATION
as
(select LKP_CODE,
        RTN_DESC
   from STAGE_CDI.REF_DPDB_TRANSLATION
),
RECORD_TYPE
as
(select NAME,
        SFDC_RECORD_TYPE_STG_ID
   from STAGE_CDI.SFDC_RECORD_TYPE_STG
),
ADV_ACC
as
(select PRU_PARTYROLEID__C ,
        SFDC_ADVISER_ACCOUNT_ID
   from STAGE_CDI.SFDC_ADVISER_ACCOUNT_STG
  where recordtype = 'Network'
),
AN_TRN
as
(select AN.NETWORK_PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        AN.ORGANISATION_NAME,
        AN.FIRM_REFERENCE_NUMBER,
        AN.STATUS,
        AN.REGULATORY_STATUS_ID,
        AN.PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID,
        AN.PERM_INVESTMENT_ADVICE,
        AN.PERM_MORTGAGE_ADVICE,
        AN.PERM_INSURANCE_ADVICE,
        AN.PERM_PENSION_ADVICE,
        AN.ADDRESS_LINE_1,
        AN.ADDRESS_LINE_2,
        AN.ADDRESS_LINE_3,
        AN.ADDRESS_LINE_4,
        AN.POSTCODE,
        AN.EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS,
        AN.PHONE_FAX_NUMBER,
        AN.UPDATE_DATE_TIME,
        coalesce(TN_ST.RTN_DESC, AN.STATUS) as PRU_STATUS__C,
        coalesce(TN_RS.RTN_DESC, AN.REGULATORY_STATUS_ID) as PRU_REGULATORYSTATUS__C,
        coalesce(TN_PR.RTN_DESC, AN.PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID) as TYPE,
        RT.SFDC_RECORD_TYPE_STG_ID as RECORDTYPEID,
        case
          when AN.EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS is null
            or STAGE_CDI.F_VALID_EMAIL_CHECK(AN.EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS) = 1 then
            0
          else
            1
        end as EMAIL_VAL_IND,
        concat(AN.ADDRESS_LINE_1,char(10),AN.ADDRESS_LINE_2) as SHIPPINGSTREET,
        case
          when AN.ADDRESS_LINE_3 is null then
            AN.ADDRESS_LINE_4
          else
            AN.ADDRESS_LINE_3
        end as SHIPPINGCITY,
        case
          when AN.ADDRESS_LINE_3 is null then
            null
          else
            AN.ADDRESS_LINE_4
          end as SHIPPINGSTATE,
        case
          when trim(AN.ORGANISATION_NAME) is null then
            1
          else
            0
        end as NAME_VAL_IND,
        case
          when AA.SFDC_ADVISER_ACCOUNT_ID is null
           and AN.STATUS = 'A' then
            1
          when AA.SFDC_ADVISER_ACCOUNT_ID is not null then
            1
          else
            0
        end as UPS_FLAG,
        'Pru' as O_SOURCE_OF_RECORD
   from ADVISER_NETWORK AN
   left outer join TRANSLATION TN_ST
     on AN.STATUS = TN_ST.LKP_CODE
   left outer join TRANSLATION TN_RS
     on AN.REGULATORY_STATUS_ID = TN_RS.LKP_CODE
   left outer join TRANSLATION TN_PR
     on AN.PARTY_ROLE_TYPE_ID = TN_PR.LKP_CODE
   left outer join RECORD_TYPE RT
     on RT.NAME = 'Network'
   left outer join ADV_ACC AA
     on AN.NETWORK_PARTY_ROLE_ID = AA.PRU_PARTYROLEID__C
)
select case
         when AT.NAME_VAL_IND = 1 then
           '<Not known>'
         else
           AT.ORGANISATION_NAME
       end as NAME,
       AT.TYPE as TYPE,
       AT.RECORDTYPEID as RECORDTYPEID,
       AT.SHIPPINGSTREET as SHIPPINGSTREET,
       AT.SHIPPINGCITY as SHIPPINGCITY,
       AT.SHIPPINGSTATE as SHIPPINGSTATE,
       AT.POSTCODE as SHIPPINGPOSTALCODE,
       AT.PHONE_FAX_NUMBER as PHONE,
       case
         when AT.EMAIL_VAL_IND = 1 then
             concat('Invalid email address: ', AT.EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS,char(10))
         when AT.NAME_VAL_IND = 1 then
           'Name is unknown'
         else
           null
       end as PRU_DATAQUALITYCOMMENT__C,
       case
         when AT.EMAIL_VAL_IND = 1
           or AT.NAME_VAL_IND = 1 then
             1
         else
           0
       end as PRU_DATAQUALITYISSUE__C,
       case
         when AT.EMAIL_VAL_IND = 1 then
           null
         else
           AT.EMAIL_URL_ADDRESS
       end as PRU_EMAIL__C,
       AT.FIRM_REFERENCE_NUMBER as PRU_FIRMREFERENCENUMBER__C,
       concat('Network_', AT.NETWORK_PARTY_ROLE_ID) as PRU_PARTYROLEID__C,
       AT.PERM_INSURANCE_ADVICE as PRU_PERMISSIONFORINSURANCEADVICE__C,
       AT.O_SOURCE_OF_RECORD as PRU_SOURCEOFRECORD__C,
       AT.PERM_INVESTMENT_ADVICE as PRU_PERMISSIONFORINVESTMENTADVICE__C,
       AT.PERM_MORTGAGE_ADVICE as PRU_PERMISSIONFORMORTGAGEADVICE__C,
       AT.PERM_PENSION_ADVICE as PRU_PERMISSIONFORPENSIONXFERADVICE__C,
       AT.PRU_REGULATORYSTATUS__C as PRU_REGULATORYSTATUS__C,
       AT.PRU_STATUS__C as PRU_STATUS__C
  from AN_TRN AT
 where AT.UPS_FLAG = 1
;
